msbt.message: Toy Day's getting close, and all I can think about is what to get folks.What if I got everyone fitness gear? A present that gets you swole? That's like two gifts in one!
I'm trying to get everything ready for Toy Day, but I ran into trouble with my wish list, .When I sat down to work on it, my super-strong fingers snapped every pencil I picked up. It was kinda cool.
The tree in the plaza's got me so hyped for Toy Day, I can't stay still. But that's OK. It's good cardio!
